ComicInfo.Summary:
David Lapham’s Juice Squeezers take on an army of giant bugs! Peter Bagge takes a comical look at American history in Founding Father Funnies! City of Roses returns with another grim crime tale from the mean streets of Portland! Read the dramatic conclusion to Billy the vampire slayer’s tale in a Jane Espenson–penned, Karl Moline–illustrated Buffy story!
Kids vs. giant bugs in David Lapham’s Juice Squeezers!
Story & Chapter TitlesSquish: A Juice Squeezer's Tale - "Shock and Awe... and Shock" - Chapter 2Nosferatu Wars - Chapter 2Founding Fathers' Funnies presents Alexander Hamilton on Mr. UnpopularityMr. Monster - "Dark Stearn" - Chapter 1Trekker: The Train to Avalon Bay - Chapter 4Crime Does Not Pay presents: City of Roses - Chapter 8Alabaster: Boxcar Tales - Chapter 8Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Love vs. Life - Chapter 3Underground - Chapter 3Hunter Quaid: The Only Things We Have to Fear... are Nazis and Creepy Monsters
